metadata.title: CVE-2022-31618 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: NVIDIA vGPU software contains a vulnerability in the Virtual GPU Manager (vGPU plugin), where it can dereference a null pointer, which may lead to denial of service.

notes.note: sbeattie> affects cGPU manager only mdeslaur> some binary drivers are no longer support by NVidia, so they are marked as ignored here
